Back: The study of physical activity and sport.

Front: What are the components of fitness?
Back: Cardiovascular fitness, muscular strength, muscular endurance, flexibility and body composition.
The ability of the heart and lungs to supply oxygen to working muscles.
The ability of muscles to exert force.
The ability of muscles to work for long periods of time.
The range of movement possible at a joint.
The percentage of body fat compared to muscle.
The ability to change direction quickly.
The ability to use body parts together smoothly.
The time taken to respond to a stimulus.
Exercise that uses oxygen to release energy.

Why is a warm up important?
Back: Reduces injury risk and improves performance.
Exercises after activity to reduce heart rate.
